mapper.select: select * from t_passenger where user_id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0

select t_ticket.ticket_id as ticketId, ticket_name as ticketName, t_passenger.passenger_id as passengerId, passenger_name as passengerName, passenger_number as passengerNumber, passenger_sex as passengerSex, passenger_birth as passengerBirth from t_passenger, t_ticket, t_order, t_orderdetail where t_orderdetail.order_id = t_order.order_id and t_orderdetail.passenger_id = t_passenger.passenger_id and t_passenger.user_id = t_order.user_id and t_orderdetail.ticket_id = t_ticket.ticket_id and t_order.order_id = #{id}
